tool_description: List of APIs to use authetication & movie information.
name: MovieRatingAPi
title: MovieRatingAPi

api_list.name: RegisterAPI
loginAPI
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movieratingapi.p.rapidapi.com/users/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movieratingapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
